name: RIFT 14
description:
RIFT 14 is a reality bending platformer built around the concept of revealing the unseen. In the game you use light and proximity to reveal jump zones within a relaxing natural landscape.

Built over 6 days for the 2018 UE4 mega jam. I totally didn't waste an entire day just on the portal alone :)

Logitech light sync compatible.

There's a total of 10-15 minutes game-play if you're a beginner, and I can speed run it in about eight minutes.
